Оригінал:

Design
Визначення

Іменник

a plan or drawing produced to show the look and function or workings of a building, garment, or other object before it is built or made.

«he has just unveiled his design for the new museum
синонимы: plan, blueprint, drawing, sketch, outline, map, plot, diagram, draft, representation»
синоніми: plan, blueprint, drawing, sketch, outline, map …
Інші варіанти

Переклад:

Дизайн
Варіанти перекладу

Іменник

задум plan, conception, design, aim
замір intention, design, premeditation

Дієслово

задумувати conceive, compose, design, agitate
конструювати design, construct, build, erect
мати намір intend, mean, contemplate, have in mi…
оформляти design, form, formalize, effect, shape, …
